channel.name: HL7-Inbound

properties.query: INSERT INTO mirth.message_audit (uuid, input_message, message_source, created_tstamp, created_by_id) VALUES (${id},convert_to(${message.rawData}, 'UTF8'),${source},current_timestamp,1)
UPDATE mirth.message_audit SET transformed_message = to_jsonb(${message.transformedData}), last_updated_tstamp = current_timestamp, last_updated_by_id = 2 WHERE uuid = ${id};

channel.preprocessingScript:
// Modify the message variable below to pre process datavar
return message;

codeTemplate.name: Function to check param is null
Function for making first letter upper case
Function to send message to kafka
